title: Inro, Ojime and Netsuke
description: four-case inro; fundame decorated in togidashi, hiramakie, hirame and takamakie with a traveler dozing on low bed, fan with Mica before face, on gold ground; reverse visions of glory \'Dream Cloud\'; Saku and Kao with agate bead ojime; ivory netsuke of Ono No Tofu and frog; attached with brown, braided, silk rope through inro and ties at bottom
creditline: Gift of Leo A. and Doris Hodroff
